definition: harakiri (formal Japanese: seppuku), a samurai's suicide by disemboweling
to purify one's body (i.e. to get castrated)
(of a slave or servant) to be given one's freedom/(of a prostitute) to marry and leave one's trade
to violate a religious precept/to smoke or drink after giving up
to force oneself upon sb (idiom)/to rape
to commit suicide by biting off one's tongue
to take refuge in religious life
to break the hymen/to lose virginity
